data.eml:eml: Anisops sardeus Herrich-Schaeffer, 1849: first records from Hungary (Heteroptera: Notonectidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article N. Soós, A. Petri, Zs. Nagy-László, Z. Csabai (2010): Anisops sardeus Herrich-Schaeffer, 1849: first records from Hungary (Heteroptera: Notonectidae). Folia Entomologica Hungarica 71: 15-18
